Posts.EditableText: Spent the last week in Georgia, U.S.A. Right off the ocean. Did some inter coastal fishing. Ate a lot at a neighbors, great fish and shrimp. Last day we had a Low Country Boil. A week was a bit long with two older brothers. We hadn't done any together for more than a day in 40 years. But we made it back to Ohio without killing each other.

Posts.EditableText: Why, oh why, oh why, oh...
Should be an adventure game in there somewhere.
